FuncDef: This command displays IKE exchange failure rate statistics of the specified scope.
CLIs: ike-exchange-failure-rate reason <reason> tunnel-group <tunnel-group-id> [ history-stats-in-count <count> ] [ history-stats-in-min <minutes> ] [ current ] [ show-oid ]

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about the specified IPsec GW name up to 32 characters in length.
Displays information about the specified the tunnel type. Values-all, sl2l, dl2l, ra.
Displays information for the cause of the failure. Values-auth-failure, non-proposal-chosen, internal-addr-assignment-failure, invalid-ts, invalid-ke, dpd-timeout, other.
Displays information about the specified ISA ID. Values-slot/mda.
Displays information about the specified tunnel group ID. Values-1 to 16.
Displays information about the specified IPsec GW name up to 32 characters in length.
Displays information for the number of statistics intervals to be displayed (starting with the most recent). Values-1 to 96.
Displays information about the specified period covered by the statistics to be displayed (starting with the most recent). Values-1 to 1440.
Displays information about the current statistic value. The values of count and minutes are ignored by the system once this parameter is specified.
Displays information about the Object Identifier (OID) of the current statistical value.
